panels.narration: IN A PUBLIC CHATROOM ON OFTC, FURRY CYBERSEX IS BEGINNING.

right.text: well... I like them, but.. what's a human like? the same?

left.text: ... You like cats better though, don't you? :P
The same roughly, only no tails or fur. I.... could show you....
.... Well... I was able to change into cat form from human form... logically, I could change back if I so desired...
